gameStyle: mobile runner, cartoon aesthetic, bright colors

spriteRequests.name: squad-member-male
spriteRequests.description: Cartoon military character with gun, running animation, 8 directions
spriteRequests.aiPrompt: Create a cartoon-style military character with a gun, bright colors, clean outlines. Running animation in 8 directions. Character should be large and visible on mobile. Simple but expressive design.
spriteRequests.notes: Characters must be BIG and visible. Each squad member should look identical for formation consistency.

spriteRequests.name: squad-member-female
spriteRequests.description: Cartoon military character (female variant), running animation, 8 directions
spriteRequests.aiPrompt: Create a female cartoon-style military character with a gun, bright colors, clean outlines. Running animation in 8 directions. Character should be large and visible on mobile. Simple but expressive design.
spriteRequests.notes: For squad variety. Should match male character's size and style.

spriteRequests.name: basic-enemy
spriteRequests.description: Enemy character that can be destroyed, contrasting color scheme

specifications.style: red/orange color scheme to distinguish from player squad

spriteRequests.aiPrompt: Create cartoon enemy character, red/orange color scheme, menacing but not scary. Idle and death animations. Should be clearly distinguishable from blue-colored player squad.

spriteRequests.name: tire-stack
spriteRequests.description: Stack of tires obstacle with HP display area

specifications.style: realistic but cartoon-shaded tires, black rubber with highlights

spriteRequests.aiPrompt: Create stacks of tires (small, medium, large variants), cartoon style with clear outlines. Black rubber with highlights. Top should have flat area for weapon pickups. Clean, mobile-friendly design.
spriteRequests.notes: Needs space on top for weapon pickups. Should look satisfying to destroy.

spriteRequests.name: destructible-crates
spriteRequests.description: Wooden crates that can be shot and destroyed
spriteRequests.aiPrompt: Create destructible obstacles: wooden crates, metal crates, explosive barrels. Cartoon style, bright colors, should look satisfying to shoot.

spriteRequests.name: holographic-gate
spriteRequests.description: Full-width holographic gate with number display
spriteRequests.aiPrompt: Create holographic gate effects: blue glowing gate for positive numbers, red glowing gate for negative numbers. Translucent with bright edges. Futuristic hologram style. Should span full width.
spriteRequests.notes: Gates span FULL WIDTH of bridge and cannot be avoided. Need space for large number display (+5, -3, etc.)

spriteRequests.name: weapon-pickups
spriteRequests.description: Glowing weapon pickups that float on obstacles

specifications.style: glowing cyan aura, rotating animation, floating effect

spriteRequests.aiPrompt: Create weapon pickup items: assault rifle, shotgun, sniper rifle, minigun. Each with glowing cyan aura. Top-down or isometric view. Should look like power-ups with particle effects.
spriteRequests.notes: Should have rotating glow effect. Placed on top of obstacles.

spriteRequests.name: bullet-projectiles
spriteRequests.description: Glowing bullet projectiles with light trails
spriteRequests.aiPrompt: Create glowing bullet projectiles in yellow, green, cyan, and magenta. Small glowing spheres with light trails. Bright and visible. Particle effect style.
spriteRequests.notes: Colors change based on squad size. ~3 bullets per second per character.

spriteRequests.name: explosion-particles
spriteRequests.aiPrompt: Create cartoon explosion effects: burst of particles, smoke, flash. Multiple color variants. Should feel satisfying and impactful. 8-12 frame animation.
spriteRequests.notes: Explosion particles should be in multiple colors for visual interest.

spriteRequests.name: damage-numbers
spriteRequests.aiPrompt: Create large golden damage number sprites (0-9 and +/-). Bold font with thick black outline. Should be very visible. Include pop-up animation frames.
spriteRequests.notes: Must be VERY large and visible for mobile. Golden color, float upward.

spriteRequests.name: hud-elements
spriteRequests.description: UI elements for score, level, squad counter
spriteRequests.aiPrompt: Create mobile game UI elements: score display panel, level indicator, squad counter background. Modern clean design with high contrast. Should be oversized and very readable on small screens.
spriteRequests.notes: All UI elements must be OVERSIZED for mobile visibility. Squad counter is VERY large at bottom center.

spriteRequests.name: bridge-sections
spriteRequests.description: Bridge road surface with lane markings

specifications.style: gray road surface with white lane markings

spriteRequests.aiPrompt: Create wide bridge road sections: gray asphalt with white lane markings. Red steel bridge pillars in Golden Gate Bridge style. Top-down view. Very wide bridge (40+ units). Clean, cartoon-style rendering.
spriteRequests.notes: Bridge must be WIDE (40 units minimum). Should tile seamlessly.

spriteRequests.name: water-texture
spriteRequests.description: Water texture for beneath the bridge
spriteRequests.aiPrompt: Create tileable ocean water texture: deep blue-green color, subtle wave patterns. Should look good with shader effects. Realistic but stylized for cartoon game.
spriteRequests.notes: Will be combined with sine wave vertex shader for realistic water simulation.

processingNotes.autoPackFolders: Folders with {tps} tag will be automatically packed into sprite sheets

GodModeAI.tips: Excellent for squad members and enemies with multiple directions

LudoAI.bestFor: Animated sprites with sound effects, particle effects
LudoAI.tips: Great for explosion effects and animated sequences

PixelVibe.bestFor: UI elements, items, backgrounds, static objects
PixelVibe.tips: Perfect for obstacles, weapons, gates, and UI elements
